√jñā 'know'

present: [9.] jānā́ti  jānīté etc. V.+  jānīma  jānithās   -- [1.] jānati  jānate etc.   -- jña (2s. impv.)  

perfect: jajñaúa  jajñé etc. V.+  

aorist: [1.] ajñāyi V.+  jñeyā́s  jñāyāt   -- [4.] ájñāsam  ajñāsthās  jñeṣam   -- [6.] ajñāsiṣam etc. AV.+  

future: [1.] jñāsyati  jñāsyate etc. B.+  ajñāsyat   -- [2.] jñātā  

verbal: jñātá V.+  jñā́tum B.+  jñā́tos  jñātvā́ B.+  -jñā́ya B.+  -jñā́yam  

secondary: passive: jñāyáte etc. V.+   -- intensive: jājñā-   -- desiderative: jijñāsate etc. AV.+  jijñāsati etc. E.+  jijñāsiṣi  jijñāsyate etc. E.+   -- causative: jñapayati etc. AV.+  jñapayate  ajijñipat  ajijñapat etc.  jñaptá B.+  jñapita  jñaptum E.+  jñapyáte  jñāpayati etc. B.+  jñāpayate etc. E.+  jñāpyate etc. E.+  ajñāpiṣyat?  jñīpsyate  

derivatives: -jānaka?  -jñā V.+  jñá B.+  jñā́s RV.  jñā́na V.+  jñātí V.+  jñātavya U.+  jñātṛ́ V.+  jñātra B.  -jñāya V.B.  jñeya B.+  -jajñi V.B.  jijñu E.  -jñapya C.  jñapana AV.B.  jñapti C.  jñāpaka E.+  jñāpya E.+  jñāpana C.  jñāpanīya C.  -jñāpayitavya C.  jijñāsā B.+  jijñāsyà B.+  jijñāsana C.  -jijñāsenya B.  -jijñāsitavya U.  jijñāsu E.+
